sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
This section covers information for those preparing for release. This section covers information for those preparing for release. Each section is aimed at helping a person progressively prepare for release from prison.

Leaving prison can be daunting and confusing. It can be hard to know what you need to do, when you need to do it, and what support is available. The information below was written by people who have left prison. They share what you can do as you prepare to leave, and how to settle back into the community once youâ€™ve been released.
